page.title: 09Stanfree School Closure.
page.content: When I went to school at Stanfree there were only 21 children there. The school only had 2 classes. One day in 1979 there was going to be a play at the school. I was going to be Mary. The play started but when I saw my mum I dropped baby Jesus and I ran to her. I liked it at Stanfree. {Stanfree school had to close in July {1984}because there were only 11 children and{it cost too much to pay {for}the central heating, dinner ladies, cleaners, caretaker, welfare assistant, clerk and 2 teachers. I think it's a shame that the school had to close because when I was there I used to play with my friends at the back of the school on the grass. I used to play with balls quite a lot, I like skipping as well. By SUZANNE CHAPMAN.
